column1: Claim A: Members of an armed militia group arrive near the Virginia Capitol building to advocate for gun rights in Richmond on Monday, Jan. 20, 2020. Claim B: Monday's rally was organized by an influential grassroots gun-rights group, the Virginia Citizens Defense League.
